Select forms to include and configure their order

1 Click the Basic Configuration tab.

The current configuration is shown in the Selected Sections box.

2 To add a section to the summary, in the Available Sections box, click the section label, and then click >>.

3 To remove a section from the summary, in the Selected Sections box, click the section label, and then click <<.

4 Use the arrows to move a highlighted section in the Selected Sections box to a new position. Sections will be shown in this order on the Preop Manager summary.

5 When you are finished configuring Preop Manager, click Close.
